item.title: Getting Started
item.description: R studio First, we need to install two programs, R and R studio. You may be wondering the differences between R and R studio, we will no go in detail in this blog but I will mention that R studio is the Graphics Interface Device that makes R much easier for us. Install the versions recommended for your machine. Once you finished the installation open R-studio and letâ€™s get started by installing the following packages.
